attributes.action: authorise an independant examination of the quality of the BBC's High definition broadcasts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently, changes were made to the way in which BBC HD programmes are broadcast.  Many viewers are unhappy with the resulting picture quality which is felt to be inferior to the picture prior to the changes. The BBC deny that picture quality has deteriorated but the evidence that it has is before our very eyes.  The BBC are not achieving their aim to be an industry leader in quality HD broadcasting.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
